Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2007...
Traded from Cleveland to Chicago (N) on 6/4/2007 (Going to CLE: P M. Moore. Going to CHN: C M. Wieters)...
Injured on 4/12/2008 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2011, off Kevin Frederick (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2011, off Leo Rojas (MIL)...
Drove in 7 runs against Pittsburgh on 5/23/2011...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/2011, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 8/2/2011...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2011, hitting .288 with 28 HR, 96 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2011...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 7/6/2012...
Was selected to the 2012 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2013...
Injured on 4/11/2015 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 7-8 weeks...
Injured on 6/17/2015 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Drove in 7 runs against Houston on 4/20/2016...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 5/28/2016...
Drove in 7 runs against Baltimore on 6/3/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/18/2016, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/13/2016, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/7/2017...
Drove in 7 runs against San Francisco on 9/21/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/9/2018, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 9/5/2018...
Drove in 7 runs against St. Louis on 7/1/2020...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (N) on 9/6/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/12/2020, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2020...
Injured on 5/14/2022 with a Fractured Hip, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/28/2022, hitting .433 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
